entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10 except 6 along exposed areas of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. High 10 except 6 along exposed areas of the coast. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
